Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.ObjectFeature
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.GameObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.MovingObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.Projectile
public class Projectile extends MovingObject
The Projectile class handles the projectiles being shot from a Hero or an Enemy.
It extends MovingObject.
The type of the projectile determines whether a Hero or an Enemy will be hurt, along with different property.

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(InteractableWorld world, int x, int y, int direction, int type)
      Constructor that takes the coordinates of x and y of the projectile shot by a Hero or an Enemy
      Parameters:
      world - current game world
      x - the x coordinate of the object to be initialized
      y - the y coordinate of the object to be initialized

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(InteractableWorld world, int x, int y, int direction, int type, boolean is_boss)
      Constructor that takes the coordinates of x and y of the projectile shot by a Boss from Enemy
      Parameters:
      world - current game world
      x - the x coordinate of the object to be initialized
      y - the y coordinate of the object to be initialized
      is_boss - the boolean's truth doesn't matter since it only is used to distinguish the normal enemy and the boss
